summary: Adds Two New Weapons, Warded Knife and Warded Machete. Inspiration taken from the Demon Wars Books.
descriptionHtml:
Adds Two New Weapons To The Game:
-----------------------------------------------

Warded Machete:
---------------------

A One-Handed, single bladed weapon, that has moderate to high stats. Can be found under the steel category of the forge,
Requires arcane blacksmith and steel smithing.
(SWORD)
----------------------------------------------------------

Warded Knife:
-----------------
A one handed , single bladed weapon, that has moderate to high stats, held in a reverse grip ,Can be found under the steel category of the forge,
Requires arcane blacksmith and steel smithing.
(DAGGER)
-----------

Installation 
--------------
Drag and drop, hopefully by now most people on the nexus get this ; )

Final Note
--------------
P.S If anyone has a good idea for an enchantment send a p.m because I was going to go with banish daedra but it just seemed a bit meh.
author: SDD707
